name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_7ade2b40-cd3e-4c38-8c80-76cc726e26fc
text:
rule Kerberos_Encryption_Downgrade {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Kerberos_Encryption_Downgrade"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Privilege escalation"
    mitre_attack_technique ="Valid Accounts"


  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4769"
    $e.metadata.description ="0x17"
    $e.principal.user.userid = $user
  
  match:
    $user over 5m
 
  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
